The city is located along Illinois Route 64 (State Street in Sycamore) about 35 miles (56 km) southeast of Rockford and 55 miles (89 km) west-northwest of Chicago.

value: address=Corner of Somonauk and Elm Street
content=Support our local Farmers and discover quality fare. Every Sunday 10am - 2pm at the corner of Somonauk and Elm Streets in downtown Sycamore.
name=Summer on State: Back to the Future
alt=Presented by the Sycamore Park District
address=Corner of Somonauk and Elm Street

content=Free outdoor screening of Back to the Future. Real De Lorean cars will be there! Bring your lawn chairs and blankets and curl up under the stars. Summer on State movies are brought to you by the Sycamore Park District.

content=City-wide Estate, Yard and Sidewalk Sales. Pick up a map of Yard Sales from the downtown sidewalk sales. List your house's sale for free by calling 895-3456. Treasures From the Attic is brought to you by OC Imageworks
address=Corner of Somonauk and Elm Street
content=free concert by Vintage Vinyl, food, beverages, 50's costume contest, remote control car races and a swing dancing competition. Cruise Night is brought to you by Auto Meter.
directions=within the Stratford Inn on Rt. 64, 5 miles north of I-88
content=Carls Fargo Restaurant & Banquets within the Stratford Inn and hosts a variety of banquets, showers, meetings and more
directions=on Rt 64, 5 miles north of I-88

content=Stratford Inn is a restored historical building built in 1926 around a corner piece of an 1880's Victorian mansion. The hotel offers thirty-five guest rooms with queen sized beds, two king rooms and two Jacuzzi suites that are within the old mansion.
